tier_3_contextual.circumstances_of_killing: Rape and murder of a ten year old girl, victim's cousin witnessed the incident, appellant fled when questioned by the victim's father

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Ashok v. State of Uttar Pradesh

residual_details.additional_facts: The High Court upheld the conviction but reduced the sentence to life imprisonment. The Supreme Court found that the evidence of the victim's cousin was not of sterling quality and the appellant's guilt beyond reasonable doubt was not established. The appellant was acquitted due to failure to provide timely and quality legal aid and non-compliance with s.313 CrPC.
